Question: In response to Soviet deployment of the SS-20, this person oversaw NATO's deployment of the Pershing missile in West Germany.
Hints: Despite an unsuccessful attempt to recall him in 1968, this person was re-elected in 1970, defeating "Big Daddy" Jesse Unruh.
Eventually, the ratings for this person's show fell off and GE dropped this person in 1962.
This person deployed the CIA's Special Activities Division to Afghanistan and Pakistan.
